Wheaton.Stratford Square Mall:
Stratford Square Mall is a shopping mall in Bloomingdale, Illinois. The 1,300,000-square-foot (120,000 m2) mall has four anchors: Carson's, Kohl's, Sears, and Burlington Coat Factory with two vacant anchors last occupied by J. C. Penney and Macy's.


== History ==
Stratford Square Mall opened in 1981.
